item.title: The Ungrateful Dead: Pete Rose, ‘Shoeless’ Joe Dying To Get Back Into Baseball
item.description: Is this heaven? No, it’s hell. Now that you're dead, welcome back to the Big Leagues. Makes a guy want to disappear into an Iowa cornfield.

item.title: Colorado’s Transgender Sanctuary State Bill Is Too Radical For California
item.description: Colorado's transgender bill defines child sterilization as "medically necessary" and punishes anyone who opposes it.

item.title: WaPo Columnist Twists Scripture To Argue Trans Feelings Matter More Than Yours
item.description: Instead of making an argument, Jennifer Finney Boylan cynically appropriates and manipulates Jesus' words to validate fallacious reasoning.

item.title: Trump’s Latest Order Could Keep You Out Of Prison For Crimes You Didn’t Even Know You Committed
item.description: A new executive order targets hidden criminal laws and restores basic due process to federal enforcement.

item.title: Sending Medicaid And Food Stamps Back To States Will Reduce Costs, Not Merely Shift Them
item.description: Because D.C. picks up the tab for food stamps and Medicaid, no one at the state level has any incentive to manage these programs responsibly.
